meanings.definition: A person who makes a promise.
meanings.sent1: The promisers assured they would finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The promisers at the meeting pledged to help each other succeed.
meanings.sent3: The promisers giggled as they pinky promised to keep the secret.
meanings.sent4: The promisers were like beacons of hope in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The young girl remembered the promisers who never broke their word.

meanings.definition: Those who make commitments or assurances.
meanings.sent1: The promisers in the group promised to support each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent2: The promisers in the company vowed to uphold their values no matter what.
meanings.sent3: The promisers playfully bet on who could keep their promise the longest.
meanings.sent4: The promisers stood out like shining stars in a sky full of doubts.
meanings.sent5: The promisers' words echoed in her mind, a reminder of their dedication.
